sentence.Network_en: Many of the refugee villages are in isolated areas.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多难民村落都在偏远地区。

sentence.Network_en: Troops tried to set up a lookout post inside a refugee camp.
sentence.Network_cn: 部队试图在难民营里设一个瞭望哨。

sentence.Network_en: Refugee workers said such action was a violation of medical ethics.
sentence.Network_cn: 难民工作者说那种行为是对医德的亵渎。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French réfugié 'gone in search of refuge', past participle of (se) réfugier, from refuge (see refuge)

entry.def: Refugees are people who have been forced to leave their homes or their country, either because there is a war there or because of their political or religious beliefs.

means.word_mean: 1. an exile who flees for safety

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"被动或主动的人"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absent缺席的+ee被动或主动的人→n.缺席者,未上班者
address地址+ee被动或主动的人→n.收件人
appoint约定,指定+ee被动或主动的人→n.被任命人,被指定人
devote投入于,献身+ee被动或主动的人→n.热爱家,皈依者,献身者
employ雇用+ee被动或主动的人→n.雇工,雇员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受审查者,投考者,应试者
stems_affixes.word_buile: examine检查,调查,考试+ee被动或主动的人→examinee
re回+fug逃+ee被动或主动的人→逃入避难所的人
return归来+ee被动或主动的人→n.回国人员,返回者
train训练,培养+ee被动或主动的人→n.受训练者

jushi.english: The government is trying to stop the increasing flow of refugees entering the country.
jushi.chinese: 政府正在设法阻止越来越多的难民流入本国。

jushi.english: The economy was further burdened by a flood of refugees.
jushi.chinese: 难民大批涌来使经济负担愈加沉重。

jushi.english: The refugees were constantly in peril of death from hunger.
jushi.chinese: 难民随时都有饿死的危险。
